properties.description: action execution  errored for type web-service.http_request err:code:400 message::{"code":2700,"message":"Bad request","description":",property:display_name error:length must be \u003c= 64, but got 78","traceid":"da025be7"}
properties.display_name: 400 Error- Display name length must be 64 chars

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
